DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - Examine effectiveness restorative yoga ( RY ) intervention v home yoga practice patient undergo chemotherapy ovarian cancer . Secondary - Examine effectiveness RY v home yoga practice depression , distress , sleep quality patient . - Examine acute ( pre- post-yoga class ) effect patient . - Test feasibility use behavioral strategy enhance yoga intervention adherence . OUTLINE : Patients randomize 1 2 arm . - Arm I ( restorative yoga intervention ) : Patients attend 45-minute group yoga class every 3 week day schedule chemotherapy approximately 5-6 session . Patients provide yoga DVD , manual photo write descriptions/guidance practice yoga posture home , basic yoga equipment ( yoga mat , strap , block , yoga blanket ) instruct practice DVD 3 time per week ( twice weekly week group yoga class ) ≥ 45 minute . Patients record yoga practice time/activity third yoga session week . - Arm II ( home yoga practice ) : Patients provide yoga DVD , manual photo write descriptions/guidance practice yoga posture home , basic yoga equipment ( yoga mat , strap , block , yoga blanket ) instruct practice DVD 3 time per week ≥ 45 minute . Patients record yoga practice time/activity third yoga session week . All patient complete questionnaire baseline , week 9 , 18 , 22 . Self-report measure include Distress Thermometer , Positive Negative Affect Schedule , Center Epidemiologic Studies-Depression Scale , M.D . Anderson Symptom Inventory , Functional Assessment Cancer Therapy - Ovarian , Functional Assessment Chronic Illness Therapy ( FACIT ) - Spiritual Subscale , FACIT- Fatigue Subscale , State-Trait Anxiety Inventory , Women 's Health Initiative Insomnia Rating Scale , Medical Outcome Study-Social Support Survey , Integrative Medicine Use , Pre- Post- Class Ratings , Intervention Feedback . After completion study , patient follow 4 week .
